GIS

Class game

  • java.lang.Object
    • GIS.game

  • public class game
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents game that contains Fruits and Packmans each of them has position and meta data associated with them, the game also include general score according to the Weight of the eaten fruits and the start time
    Author:
    Aric and Tal
